item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Sunday, November 10, 2024 at 3:20 AM UTC
item.description:
1. OpenCoder: Open Cookbook for Top-Tier Code Large Language Models (304 points | 38 comments)
2. Show HN: Visprex – Open-source, in-browser data visualisation tool for CSV files (79 points | 10 comments)
3. IronCalc – Open-Source Spreadsheet Engine (259 points | 81 comments)
4. Show HN: Jaws – a JavaScript to WASM ahead-of-time compiler (159 points | 61 comments)
5. Archaeologists Puzzled by Skeleton of Bones of People Who Died 1000's Yrs Apart (12 points | 4 comments)
6. NYC Subway Station Layouts (123 points | 52 comments)
7. Zig's (.{}){} Syntax (123 points | 56 comments)
8. FrontierMath: A benchmark for evaluating advanced mathematical reasoning in AI (74 points | 26 comments)
9. Mergiraf: a syntax-aware merge driver for Git (323 points | 69 comments)
10. Early Cascade Injection: From Windows process creation to stealthy injection (85 points | 11 comments)
11. Grim Fandango (128 points | 41 comments)
12. A mod that turns TI-84 calculators into GPT-based cheating device (23 points | 2 comments)
13. Show HN: HTML-to-Markdown – convert entire websites to Markdown with Golang/CLI (250 points | 43 comments)
14. Verbalize – text editor with writing assistance for Brazilian Portuguese (6 points | discuss)
15. You too can write a book (80 points | 25 comments)
16. When machine learning tells the wrong story (83 points | 6 comments)
17. Texture-Less Text Rendering (181 points | 46 comments)
18. Scientist treated her own cancer with viruses she grew in the lab (421 points | 166 comments)
19. HPV vaccination: How the world can eliminate cervical cancer (314 points | 148 comments)
20. Ticketmaster’s attempt to game arbitration services fails (248 points | 104 comments)
21. Obtainium: Get Android App Updates Directly from the Source (167 points | 74 comments)
22. SVDQuant: 4-Bit Quantization Powers 12B Flux on a 16GB 4090 GPU with 3x Speedup (156 points | 52 comments)
23. Since the '60s, Ford has stored cars underground in a Kansas City cave (143 points | 51 comments)
24. Notes on Guyana (115 points | 102 comments)
25. Somebody moved the UK's oldest satellite in the mid 1970s, but no one knows who (89 points | 46 comments)
26. Can humans say the largest prime number before we find the next one? (286 points | 130 comments)
27. Trellis (YC W24) is hiring eng to turn documents into database ( | hide)
28. A Brief History of Cyrix (68 points | 13 comments)
29. The Saturn V FUELDRAULIC Gimbal System (1963) (42 points | 13 comments)
30. Delta: A syntax-highlighting pager for Git, diff, grep, and blame output (571 points | 83 comments)
item.guid: Hacker News Top Stories: Sunday, November 10, 2024 at 3:20 AM UTC
